## EditLiveSearchOptions interface

Edit live search options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EditLiveSearchOptions extends LiveSearchOptions<CssClassesEditLiveSearch> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [LiveSearchOptions](./select.livesearchoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;[CssClassesEditLiveSearch](./select.cssclasseseditlivesearch.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [emptyCancel](./select.editlivesearchoptions.emptycancel.md) | boolean | Indicaiton whether empty string in live search cancel selected value |
|  [keepSearchValue](./select.editlivesearchoptions.keepsearchvalue.md) | boolean | Indication whether keep search value after popup close |
|  [nonExistingCancel](./select.editlivesearchoptions.nonexistingcancel.md) | boolean | Indication whether cancel selected value if non existing value is in live search, works for single value |
